Works perfectly, thanks hellboy.

**Guide for noobs*
First, download. Install PC Tuneup 2011 from the folder of the same name. 
Next, open the folder containing the PC Tuneup applications (usually C:/Program Files x86/AVG/PC Tuneup). Delete these files: "BoostSpeed.exe", "aushelper.dll", "TweakManager.exe", and "commonforms.dll".
Finally, move the four files from the "crack" folder in the torrent to the same folder that you deleted the original ones from (C:/Program Files x86/AVG/PC Tuneup). That's it!
Hope this helped!
